name: page-structural-semantics-scanner-tests
description: Test and benchmarking suite for code that extracts information on the structure of web pages, such as landmarks, headings and articles
author: Matthew Tylee Atkinson

scripts._build: npx embedme README.md && git add README.md && node script/combineFixturesExpectations.js && git add combined
scripts.version: npm run build && conventional-changelog-moulded-angular 'Page Structural Semantics Scanner Tests' && git add CHANGELOG.md
